entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then periods of snow beginning this evening and ending after midnight. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 40%
